task_description: Navigate to Pizza Hut. Walk straight along the service road, keeping the corrugated metal construction fence on your left and the Unilever building on your right. At the end of the road, turn right onto the street running alongside the large building with white V-shaped columns. The destination is on the left, marked by a Pizza Hut sign on a pylon.

   - Keeping corrugated metal fence on left, Unilever building on right

   - Pizza Hut will be on the left with a pylon sign

   - There appears to be a corrugated metal construction fence on the left side
   - There's a building structure on the right (likely the Unilever building mentioned)
